tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Pregnancy Check Up,
review: I recommend this doctor because I had major issues in my pregnancy due to that I had gone through the LSCS surgery done by dr.lalitha madam .she  friendly treated me and gave me positive vibes to a good birth. From starting of my pregnancy to my labour she treated me and I middle of my pregnancy i faced a lot problems and came back because of her .I was admitted in aster hospital for my low platelet count and had breathing issues due to dengue positive and she personally visited me to check health condition and she was collecting my day to day health condition from the aster doctors. That is what I liked in her and it is called a good soul doctor who doesn't prefer money instead she looks after a person's life .i finally thank this doctor who made me mother and gave my baby safely to me ..üôèüôè

****** ******* ** *** **** *********** ******** ****** ***** ******* ******* ******* *** ******* ***** *** **** *** doesn't even explain what you are going through. My consultation was just for 2 mins. very bad experience
*** **** *************.I delivered my baby under her guidance.10/10 for her positive vibes and friendliness which is very important for a doctor.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very nice and good treatment i am full satisfied with my health treatment dr dharmapal orthopedic refer to her so thank you for both of us
